archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Control Sales Inventory Access
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modelled in business process terms, and can be applied (i.e. â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Managing the registration and access control processes that enable processes to create, modify, update, delete and/or download sales data to and from the sales inventory.
